item.title: Gear
item.description: Below is my gear list. Stuff I use on a regular basis. Links to product website when possible otherwise to Amazon. Bikes Giant Anyroad 1 2017 (main) Giant Defy 3 2016 Dahon Speed Uno folding bike Unicycle Bags Topeak TopLoader Top Tube Bag Topeak Midloader Topeak Aero Wedge Topeak Backloader Lights Topeak Aero Combox (fork lights) Cygolite Hotshot Pro (rear light) Cycle Torch Shark 500 (head light) Ascher USB Rechargeable Bike Light Set (backup lights) Computer Garmin Edge 520 K-EDGE Garmin & GoPro Mount Pixel 3 phone Camera and accessories GoPro Hero 6 Anker PowerCore 13000 C Samsung 256GB Memory Card Tires and tubes Continental Gatorskins 700x32c Specialized Armadillo 700x32c Continental 42mm Presta Valve Tube Clothing high viz yellow when available Gore jacket Gore helmet cap Gore overshoes Gore gloves Pearl Izumi Lobster Gloves Giro gloves Pearl iZUMi Elite Thermal Cycling Legwarmer Pearl iZUMi Men’s Escape Quest Cycling Shorts Owayo custom cycling jersey Clear safety glasses Tinted safety glasses Maintenance Topeak Joe Blow Sport III Floor Pump GODESON Tire Pressure Gauge Park Tool Chain Checker CC-3.
